description: T.1 Holly x2 - Crown lift secondary growth to 4m from ground level.T.2 Leylandii hedge - Trim to shape (exempt).T.3 Silver birch - 1m Lateral reduction of overhang.T.4 Ivy - Remove (exempt).T.5 Oak - Crown lift secondary growth to 5m from ground level.T.6 Oak - Crown lift secondary growth to match T.5 & 1.5-2m lateral reduction over third oak tree to clear roof.
